name: Fragment of a Golden Melody
description: A golden fragment that fell from the centaur golem's chest. Putting the tuneinscribed upon the shattered rubble back together, it appears to be a smallsliver of a grander musical movement.  People once believed that the song of eternal happiness and harmony wouldresound throughout the world till the end of all destinies. But harmonies canbe changed. When the rebellious God King fell from his throne, theimperishable capital was reduced to refuse and rubble — for who, then, shallthe lyre in the hands of a legion-less commander play?
